channel.title: Vampire slayer quest
channel.description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------Quest ID:(15)Vampire slayer---------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------------
Npc ID: ID: 96 Count Draynor ID: 97 Morgan ID: 98 Dr Harlow
Item ID: ID: 217: stake ID: 168 hammer ID: 218: Garlic ID: 10: coins ID: 193: beer
object ID: ID: 141 cupboard: coords: 216,1562
Missing objects: ID: 25 candles coords 202, 3382 ID: 25 candles coords 207, 3382 ID: 41 stairs coords: 204, 3384 ID: 203 coffin coords: 204, 3381 ID: 104 bronze med coordS: 206,3380
Missing trees draynor manor: [code]<GameObjectLoc> //draynor manor start <id>70</id> <x>211</x> <y>567</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>70</id> <x>210</x> <y>566</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>88</id> <x>208</x> <y>564</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>38</id> <x>212</x> <y>563</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>70</id> <x>211</x> <y>563</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>88</id> <x>210</x> <y>561</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>70</id> <x>214</x> <y>565</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> /// draynor manor end <id>70</id> <x>216</x> <y>567</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc>[/code]
Npc Quest stages:
Search cupboard: for garlic in draynor ----------------------------------------------------------- SendMessage("You search the cupboard"); SendMessage("You find a clove of garlic that you take");
Morgan: 1)Stage 0--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/0vdM4YEt 2)Stage 1--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/20XNr7sn 3)Stage 2 (after you complete quest)-------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/mfve3vrv
Dr hallow: 1)Stage 0------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/FaYpt9NY 2)Stage 1------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/RhkcZF1p 3)Stage 2 (on his 3rd beer after you say ok mate)-------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/Ge0JR9Vj 4)Stage 3 after you complete quest-------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/FaYpt9NY
IF you loose stake you have to redo the process with the beers................
Attacking count Draynor with stake+hammer(when he gets low hp and is about to die then):--------------- http://pastebin.com/xHnTSDrN
Attacking count "without stake": He regenerates HP back to full
Attempting to attack vampire after u complete quest:-------------------------------- SendMessage("You've already done that quest");

item.title: Vampire slayer quest
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

--------------------Quest ID:(15)Vampire slayer----------------------

Npc ID:
ID: 96 Count Draynor
ID: 97 Morgan
ID: 98 Dr Harlow

Item ID:
ID: 217: stake
ID: 168 hammer
ID: 218: Garlic

ID: 193: beer

object ID:
ID: 141 cupboard: coords: 216,1562

ID: 25 candles coords 202, 3382
ID: 25 candles coords 207, 3382
ID: 41 stairs coords: 204, 3384
ID: 203 coffin coords: 204, 3381
ID: 104 bronze med coordS: 206,3380

Missing trees draynor manor:

<GameObjectLoc> //draynor manor start <id>70</id> <x>211</x> <y>567</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>70</id> <x>210</x> <y>566</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>88</id> <x>208</x> <y>564</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>38</id> <x>212</x> <y>563</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>70</id> <x>211</x> <y>563</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>88</id> <x>210</x> <y>561</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>70</id> <x>214</x> <y>565</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> /// draynor manor end <id>70</id> <x>216</x> <y>567</y> <direction>6</direction> <type>0</type> </GameObjectLoc>

Npc Quest stages:

Search cupboard: for garlic in draynor ----------------------------------------------------------- SendMessage(“You search the cupboard”);
SendMessage(“You find a clove of garlic that you take”);

Morgan:
1)Stage 0--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/0vdM4YEt
2)Stage 1--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/20XNr7sn
3)Stage 2 (after you complete quest)-------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/mfve3vrv

Dr hallow:
1)Stage 0------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/FaYpt9NY
2)Stage 1------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/RhkcZF1p
3)Stage 2 (on his 3rd beer after you say ok mate)-------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/Ge0JR9Vj
4)Stage 3 after you complete quest-------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/FaYpt9NY

IF you loose stake you have to redo the process with the beers…

Attacking count Draynor with stake+hammer(when he gets low hp and is about to die then):--------------- http://pastebin.com/xHnTSDrN

Attacking count “without stake”: He regenerates HP back to full

Attempting to attack vampire after u complete quest:-------------------------------- SendMessage(“You’ve already done that quest”);
